short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension used to identify when a BridgeNet employee is accessing a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is extension is intended to be installed by BridgeNet employees.  Initially the extension simply allows us to programmatically detect when a person visiting a site is a BridgeNet employee so that we can exclude BridgeNet employees from the site user logs that have been requested by clients.  Eventually more functionality may be added.
